attributes.action: Give the Formby hall back to Atherton
attributes.background: To save this hall from intended demolition, and the continued use by local residents

rejection.details:
The decision about the demolition of Formby Hall is for Wigan Council to take.

You can find out how to start a petition to the Council here:

http://democracy.wigan.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1

You can find out how to submit your views on a planning application here:

http://kinnear.wigan.gov.uk/planapps/
